# ðŸ§© Template Blocks

This directory contains reusable template blocks that can be composed into larger templates.

## Available Blocks

Template blocks will be added here as they are developed. Each block should:
- Have a clear, specific purpose
- Be reusable across multiple contexts
- Follow emoji naming conventions
- Include usage examples

## Coming Soon

- Approval workflow blocks
- Review checklist blocks
- Evidence collection blocks
- Verification step blocks
